question: Consider the following statements related to the reservation for the weaker sections in India. 1.The first Backward Classes Commission was appointed under the Chairmanship of Kaka Saheb Kalelkar. 2.Second Backward Classes Commission was appointed in 1978 under B P Mandal. 3.Article 240 mandated that the government should identify classes which were “socially and educationally backward”. Which of the above statements is true?
explanation: The first Backward Classes Commission was set up to determine criteria to identify people as socially and educationally Backward Classes. Second Backward Classes Commission was appointed in 1978 under B P Mandal to review the state of the Backward Classes. Article 340 mandated that the government need to identify classes which are socially and educationally backward and implement measures to improve their condition.
